tool_description: Scrapes OnlyFans profile data, e.g. profile / header image URL, pricing, description, etc ...
title: OnlyFans Profile Scraper

api_list.name: Retrieve a profile
api_list.description: Retrieve a profile that contains data, such as profile / header image URL, description, pricing, timestamps, etc ...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://onlyfans-profile-scraper2.p.rapidapi.com/profile/{username}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onlyfans-profile-scraper2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
